description.zh: 北京 亚马逊云科技 User Group 是中国最活跃的云计算技术社区之一，汇聚了众多云计算专家和开发者。
description.en: Beijing User Group is one of the most active cloud computing communities in China, bringing together numerous cloud experts and developers.

description.zh: 上海 亚马逊云科技 User Group 致力于为上海地区的开发者提供最新的云计算技术分享和交流平台。
description.en: Shanghai User Group is dedicated to providing developers in Shanghai with the latest cloud computing technology sharing and communication platform.

description.zh: 深圳 亚马逊云科技 User Group 聚焦于创新技术和实践，为深圳科技企业提供云计算解决方案交流。
description.en: Shenzhen User Group focuses on innovative technologies and practices, providing cloud computing solution exchanges for Shenzhen tech companies.

description.zh: 武汉 亚马逊云科技 User Group 服务于华中地区的云计算爱好者，推动本地云技术发展。
description.en: Wuhan User Group serves cloud computing enthusiasts in Central China, promoting local cloud technology development.

description.zh: 西安 亚马逊云科技 User Group 连接古都与现代科技，为西北地区提供云计算技术支持。
description.en: Xi'an User Group connects the ancient capital with modern technology, providing cloud computing technical support for Northwest China.

description.zh: 昌吉 亚马逊云科技 User Group 致力于推动新疆地区云计算技术的普及和应用。
description.en: Changji User Group is committed to promoting the popularization and application of cloud computing technology in Xinjiang.

description.zh: 成都 亚马逊云科技 User Group 服务于西南地区，促进云计算技术在当地的发展和应用。
description.en: Chengdu User Group serves Southwest China, promoting the development and application of cloud computing technology locally.

description.zh: 兰州 亚马逊云科技 User Group 为西北地区的开发者提供云计算学习和交流的平台。
description.en: Lanzhou User Group provides a platform for developers in Northwest China to learn and exchange cloud computing knowledge.

description.zh: 广州 亚马逊云科技 User Group 连接华南地区的云计算专业人士，推动技术创新。
description.en: Guangzhou User Group connects cloud computing professionals in South China, driving technological innovation.

description.zh: 福州 亚马逊云科技 User Group 为福建地区的技术爱好者提供云计算知识分享平台。
description.en: Fuzhou User Group provides a cloud computing knowledge sharing platform for tech enthusiasts in Fujian.

description.zh: 苏州 亚马逊云科技 User Group 服务于长三角地区，促进云计算技术的交流与合作。
description.en: Suzhou User Group serves the Yangtze River Delta region, promoting cloud computing technology exchange and cooperation.

description.zh: 杭州 亚马逊云科技 User Group 汇聚互联网之都的技术精英，推动云计算创新发展。
description.en: Hangzhou User Group brings together tech elites from the Internet capital, driving innovative development in cloud computing.

description.zh: 河池 亚马逊云科技 User Group 致力于推动广西地区云计算技术的发展和普及。
description.en: Hechi User Group is committed to promoting the development and popularization of cloud computing technology in Guangxi.

description.zh: 乌鲁木齐 亚马逊云科技 User Group 为新疆地区提供云计算技术支持和社区服务。
description.en: Urumqi User Group provides cloud computing technical support and community services for Xinjiang region.

description.zh: 青岛 亚马逊云科技 User Group 服务于山东半岛地区，推动海洋城市的云计算发展。
description.en: Qingdao User Group serves the Shandong Peninsula region, promoting cloud computing development in the coastal city.

description.zh: 厦门 亚马逊云科技 User Group 为海峡西岸经济区提供云计算技术交流平台。
description.en: Xiamen User Group provides a cloud computing technology exchange platform for the West Taiwan Strait Economic Zone.

description.zh: 张家口 亚马逊云科技 User Group 服务于京津冀地区，推动冬奥城市的技术发展。
description.en: Zhangjiakou User Group serves the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region, promoting technological development in the Winter Olympics city.

description.zh: 合肥 亚马逊云科技 User Group 为安徽地区的科技创新提供云计算技术支持。
description.en: Hefei User Group provides cloud computing technical support for technological innovation in Anhui province.
